description.title: Get started on Windows
instructions: 1. Download and run the Windows installer
2. Click on "Log inâ€¦" from the Omniedge icon now in your system tray
3. Sign in with your email address
4. Click "Connect" in the menu bar from the tray icon. After a pop up disappears, a secure VPN connection is initialized.

android.captionText: Compatible with Android 6 or later mobile phone or TV.

description.title: Get started on Android Phone & TV
instructions: 1. Download OmniEdge APK and install it
2. Run OmniEdge and Sign in with your email address
3. Click the connect button
4. Allow to install a VPN configuration
5. Enjoy the secure VPN connection

linuxcli.captionText: Compatible with linux for AMD64,ArmV7 and Arm64V8, Archlinux, OMV(Debian 9), Synology NAS,Ubuntu 16.04/18.04/20.04, CentOS 7/8, Debian 9/10, Fedora 32

description.title: Get started on Linux Cli
instructions: 1. Sign up your account with your email and password: Sign up
2. Download and install omnidge cli depend on system architecture :
OmniEdge linux Cli for AMD64
#CODE wget https://github.com/omniedgeio/omniedge-linux-cli/releases/download/v0.1.0/omniedge-amd64.zip
OmniEdge linux Cli for Arm64V8
#CODE wget https://github.com/omniedgeio/omniedge-linux-cli/releases/download/v0.1.0/omniedge-arm64v8.zip
OmniEdge linux Cli for ArmV7
#CODE wget https://github.com/omniedgeio/omniedge-linux-cli/releases/download/v0.1.0/omniedge-armv7.zip
3. Login and Join omniedge:

#CODE sudo omniedge login -u user@email.com &&
sudo omniedge join
4. Wait a second and a secure VPN will be established

description.title: Get started on Linux Cli
instructions: 1. Sign up your account with your email and password: Sign up
2. Download and install omnidge cli
#CODE curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/omniedgeio/omniedge-linux-cli/main/omniedge-install.sh | bash
3. Login and Join omniedge:

#CODE sudo omniedge login -u user@email.com &&
sudo omniedge join
4. Wait a second and a secure VPN will be established

macos.captionText: Compatible with intel Macbook, macOS 10 or later

description.title: Get started on macOS
instructions: 1. Download OmniEdge DMG and open it.
2. Install tuntap by clicking tuntap_20150118.pkg
3. Drop Omniedge to Applications folder
4. Run OmniEdge
5. Sign in with your email address
6. Click the button near 'off' to connect, then a secure VPN connection is initialized.
